anti_patterns.name: Zombie Ticket (Too Old)
anti_patterns.description: This item hasn't been updated in over 90 days.
anti_patterns.remedy: Verify relevance with stakeholders. Delete or Archive if obsolete.

anti_patterns.name: Undefined Work (No AC)
anti_patterns.remedy: Do not bring into Sprint. Run a refinement session to define 'Done'.

anti_patterns.name: Elephant in the Room (Too Big)
anti_patterns.description: Story points exceed 13, making it risky for a single sprint.
anti_patterns.remedy: Split this item. Look for 'Conjunctions' (and/or) in the summary to find split points.
